column4: Under Add/Remove I see tons of programs with K in the name, but I am running Gnome, are they usable in Gnome or only KDE?

Is there a beryl support channel?  Or should I just give up on beryl.  (I installed it with ati radeon xpress 200 G onboard video, and it opens, but shows me a white screen.... when I alt+tab+arrow, the cube rotates, but it is a strictly whiite cube... :)
